description: On 11 March 2009, the Republic of Indonesia deposited with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, pursuant to article 47, paragraph 9, of the Convention, a list of geographical coordinates of points of the Indonesian Archipelagic Baselines based on the Government Regulation of the Republic of Indonesia Number 38 of 2002 as amended by the Government Regulation of the Republic of Indonesia Number 37 of 2008. The list of geographical coordinates of points is referenced to the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84).
name: Indonesian Sea Boundary
